name: accountant-platform
description: Accounting services platform with client and admin portals

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../adminside && npm install && cd ../packages/shared && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules adminside/node_modules packages/*/node_modules frontend/.next adminside/.next
scripts.types:generate: echo 'Run: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id YOUR_PROJECT_ID > packages/shared/types/database.types.ts'
